name: Zelda 5: A Link Is Here
description:
IT'S DANGEROUS TO GO ALONE, SERIOUSLY DON'T

The legends foretell of a hero who will come to save the world and get to do whatever he wants without anyone getting pissed

That's you, that is definitely you, you even have the outfit, look

Now it's time to break all 99 pots I mean defeat all the evil people yeah

CONTROLS

MOVE: Arrows // WASD

JUMP: Up // W

GRAB/THROW: Space Bar

WHAT?

Created in 18 days for PIGSquad's Summer Slow Jams July 2021 with the themes of Remix and Unreliable Narrator

Based on a conversation with Will Lewis about the bootleg Link on this strategy guide that was for sale in Pink Gorilla in Seattle:
